name: Chaos Theory (itch) (skeeeth)
description:
Physics-based 2d Arena Shooter.  Mouse only
You play as the center piece of a double pendulum,  you can dash to the end affixed to you and disconnect from and replace the pivot you are attached to.  Fire a projectile when your strings are in full tension, at max distance from the pivot.  Use this and your maneuverability to take out the chaos generators that fill the arena, once these generators are alive for a short amount of time they begin increasing the chaos meter; once this reaches 100% its game over, so take out the enemies as fast as you can!

Controls:

Left click and hold to materialized a pivot , the max length of string is the distance between you and the pivot at the moment of creation.  Right click to to be pulled by your attached pendulum.
